frontmatter.title: PaperFaces portrait of The In Laws
frontmatter.excerpt: PaperFaces portrait of The In Laws drawn with Paper for iOS on an iPad.

markdownRemark.html:
On our wedding day I took a photograph of my in laws. Some years later I used it to create this black and white illustration for a birthday present.

Tools used:

  • LunaTik Alloy Touch Pen
  • Paper for iOS
